name: UniverseBalls
description:
Hi! I'm Striker a totally indie game dev eloper and this is my project, UniverseBall. It took me a few days making this little game (wich is not finished) where you're like a mini "god" and you create your own universe using miniplanets, plants and animals to earn LifePoints which is the in game money.
I designed all the Assets you're watching and I programmed all the functions.
As I said the game is not finished yet. I need to implement new functions like hunger on animals and a hunting system, also to add brand new animals, trees and planets.
I'm proud of the progress I've made and I'll continue developing the game untill finished.
Hope you like the tiny progress I  made of this new project.

*How to Play *
 * Use WASD Keys to move around the scene
 * Have fun
